name: Followers of Cthulhu
description:
Followers of Cthulhu

Followers of Cthulhu is a city-builder/tower defense game in which you must protect the portal to Cthulhu against Hastur's never ending hordes. You must balance resource gathering, building costs, and security to finally build the ultimate temple to Cthulhu and give him the power he needs to defeat Hastur and break out of his imprisonment.   

* Day/Night Cycle

* Weather

* Resource Gathering

* Awesome soundtrack

* Great hand drawn art!

*Who can resist worshipping Cthulhu!

Game will continue to be worked on adding more buildings, levels, and enemies and eventually be released on Steam at a higher price. Get in on the ground floor to secure an awesome game in your library!

WARNING: I cannot be held responsible if you become addicted to gameplay and miss school, work, weddings, funerals, etc.
